[Record linkage](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Record_linkage).) is the problem of identifying records which refer to the same person or entity. A typical use case is to construct individual customer profiles given disparate order records and data spread across multiple sources. These profiles can be used to gain insights into the behavior of customers and to guide marketing efforts.

I provide end-to-end solutions to record linkage and data analysis in such business settings. Use the form below to contact me and learn more about my services:
